__e: Oh, please don't tell me that's what you've been holding back all this time.
"If you won't believe me... if you can't trust me then I can't stay here!"
I don't know what you're so mad about and scared of because you won't talk to me, but I'm scared, too.
If you refuse to talk about things that bothers you... we won't come to see you anymore!
I don't know what you're so mad about and scared of because you won't talk to me, but I'm scared, too.
"If you won't believe me... if you can't trust me then I can't stay here!"
First you say you'll do anything I want, then you refuse the first thing I ask for.
You were the first person I cared about outside of my family, and at the risk of you telling me off, I want to make it up to you in every way I can.
We gotta investigate him, and if you won't, I'll do it on my own.
And if you blow it, you're gonna end up hating yourself for the rest of your life.
You wanna know why you don't want me to have the baby?
You're just like any other patient, running away from knowledge that won't make you happy.
No, the problem... is that you are always denying yourself who you really are.
